text:
Oh, Mano, good job!
...What's up? Why are you here?

...Producer-san, welcome back.
Um, I was practicing making expressions...

Yes... After the last shoot, thanks to the
Daurian Redstart, I got the OK...

...I wanted to be able to create a good
smile with my own effort...

I see, yeah...
Your determination to do your best is admirable.

(She probably wants to keep practicing until
she's satisfied... But Mano's already──────)

...Thank you very much...
I'll do my best...
